The statement made by Republican Rep: Morgan Griffith claiming that "Our country has succeeded in reducing greenhouse gas emissions in previous years" was fact-checked.
The data used to support the claim was o: s "Inventory of U.S. Greenhouse Gases and Sinks, 1990-2017" report.
The report indicated that U: S. greenhouse gas emissions had indeed decreased from 7,371 metric tons in 2007 to 6,472 metric tons in 2017, representing an 11.8 percent decrease over the period.
However: it was noted that the rate of decrease in emissions had slowed in recent years, with only a three-tenths of 1 percent decrease in 2017, suggesting a potential slowdown in progress.
